entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'you' by Dumbledore. He is mentioned as having a Patronus and being involved in a Quidditch match.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard who is speaking with Harry. He mentions Sirius and the Patronus charm.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend who told Dumbledore about how they became Animagi.

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: The Patronus that Harry produced, which is also the name of a former owner of Sirius.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who was targeted by Harry's Patronus in a Quidditch match.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts that Harry played against in a Quidditch match.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is speaking with Harry, sharing his thoughts and insights.
Harry's friend Sirius told Dumbledore about how they became Animagi.
Dumbledore mentions that Harry produced the Patronus 'Prongs'.
Harry's Patronus targeted Malfoy in a Quidditch match.
